title: Heart Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Founded 2011 by an Englishwoman with the purpose to raise awareness of the plight of the native people in the highlands to all those who pass through. Menu offers wholefood dishes with fish, chicken, and vegetarian choices. Pastries and breakfasts all day. Staff understand basic English.
